alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains of Oregon; Deschutes National Forest - minus Sisters Ranger District; Southern Blue and Strawberry Mountains (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 04 at 1:41PM PDT until August 04 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING FOR ABUNDANT LIGHTNING REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING FOR FIRE ZONES OR611, OR640, AND OR642... ...RED FLAG WARNING HAS BEEN CANCELLED FOR FIRE ZONES OR644 AND OR645... .Thunderstorms capable of producing abundant lightning over portions of central and northeast Oregon are forecast through this evening. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR ABUNDANT LIGHTNING FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES OR611, OR640, AND OR642... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 611 Deschutes National Forest minus Sisters Ranger District, 640 Central Mountains of Oregon and 642 Southern Blue and Strawberry Mountains. * IMPACTS...Lightning with thunderstorms will increase the likelihood of new fire starts, especially in dry fuel beds. * OUTFLOW WINDS...Outflow winds gusting 25 to 45 mph could cause erratic fire behavior on new and pre-existing fires.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Central Mountains of Oregon; Deschutes National Forest - minus Sisters Ranger District; Southern Blue and Strawberry Mountains
